meanings.definition: A winged reproductive ant or termite.
meanings.sent1: The alates emerged from the ant colony to start new colonies.
meanings.sent2: I saw the alates flying around the light outside.
meanings.sent3: The alates decided to have a race to see who could fly the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The alates danced in the air like delicate fairies.
meanings.sent5: The alates' wings shimmered in the sunlight as they took flight.

meanings.definition: To produce winged reproductive ants or termites.
meanings.sent1: The queen ant alates every spring to ensure the survival of the colony.
meanings.sent2: The termite mound alates new members when the population grows too large.
meanings.sent3: The ant workers cheered as the queen alated a new generation of alates.
meanings.sent4: The termites alated into the night, seeking new homes in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The ants diligently alated to expand their colonies and ensure their future.
